body_html:
TEST_SRCDIR environment variable is actually created by bazel.
If you are not running with bazel, could you try to set it to the root of your TF source repository before you run your tests? In your case, I think the following should suffice

export TEST_SRCDIR=`pwd`
body_text:
TEST_SRCDIR environment variable is actually created by bazel.
If you are not running with bazel, could you try to set it to the root of your TF source repository before you run your tests? In your case, I think the following should suffice
export TEST_SRCDIR=`pwd`
body:
TEST_SRCDIR environment variable is actually created by bazel.
If you are not running with bazel, could you try to set it to the root of your TF source repository before you run your tests? In your case, I think the following should suffice
```
export TEST_SRCDIR=`pwd`
```
